meanings.definition: The act of breeding more offspring than another individual or group.
meanings.sent1: The outbreedings of the rabbits led to a larger population in the meadow.
meanings.sent2: The outbreedings of the birds resulted in a diverse gene pool within the flock.
meanings.sent3: The outbreedings of the ants caused quite a buzz in the insect community.
meanings.sent4: Her outbreedings in the garden of flowers brought a riot of colors to the landscape.
meanings.sent5: The outbreedings of the fish made the aquarium a lively and bustling place.

meanings.definition: The process of producing offspring through mating with individuals outside of one's own group or species.
meanings.sent1: The outbreedings of the wolves introduced new genetic traits to the pack.
meanings.sent2: The outbreedings of the horses led to stronger and healthier foals.
meanings.sent3: The outbreedings of the bees created quite a buzz in the hive.
meanings.sent4: Her outbreedings in the garden of vegetables resulted in a harvest of various shapes and sizes.
meanings.sent5: The outbreedings of the dogs brought a mix of breeds to the neighborhood park.
